[[File:SunStone.png|thumb|200px|The Sun Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Sun Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Goldenrod City]] in [[Johto]]. It can also be mined from the [[Underground]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Gloom || | Bellossom |- | Sunkern || | Sunflora |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
